akn:content.akn:p: § 495. Staff composition The Council shall have a staff, the head of which shall be a civilian Executive Secretary, who shall be appointed by the President. The President is authorized to fix the pay of the Executive Secretary at a rate not to exceed the rate of pay payable to the Executive Secretary of the National Security Council. (Pub. L. 107–296, title IX, § 905, Nov. 25, 2002, 116 Stat. 2259.)
